verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: When the earth is shaken as its shaking is appointed.
verse.verse_2: And the earth throws out its burdens.
verse.verse_3: And man says, 'what happened to her?'
verse.verse_4: That day it shall narrate all its news.
verse.verse_5: For your Lord has sent command to her.
verse.verse_6: On that day people will return towards their Lord being in different ways, so that they may be shown their deeds.
verse.verse_7: Then whosoever has done good of an atom's weight shall see it.
verse.verse_8: And whosoever has done evil of an atom's weight shall see it.
